definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: deriv. & mng. dub.; only Ez Eze 23:24 [[וּבָאוּ עָלַיִח הׂחֶן רֶכֶב וְגַלְגַּל]]; txt. prob. in error: LXX [[מִצָּפוֹן]] so Co (cf. Eze 26:7); SyrVer Targum with arms; Hi [[הָחֵן]], Inf. Hiph. of √ [[חנן]], with rattling; Ew [[חׂחֶן]] (so Codd.) with shoulder as place of carrying weapon; Bö Sm [[חֲמוֹן]] multitude; Dl:Baer's Ezech. xi. gains like sense without emend. by comparing As. êṣin (-ši) collect, gather, Flood Tabl.:ii. 25 ff., but this very dubious.
